msg: try out the Cool Tools perl on the zone

author: jukka
msg: JCR-742: Use getPath() instead of getParent() to avoid possible AccessDeniedExceptions. Added a default toString() implementation.

author: mturyn
msg: 1.) Removed putting "superclass()" method on instances; method is only used in one place in code, and is potentially dangerous---let's don't leave a bomb lying around.
2.) Gave constructors a useful stringifier; improved instances'.

author: mturyn
msg: a.) Removed references to ill-considered superclass() method on bridge instances, which has now been removed.
b.) Fixed a bug that could make an attribute show up in the list twice.
2.) Moved the attribute mapper creation method from onAttributeSet (called many times, usually) to init() (called once/bridge).

author: noirin
msg: HTML files changed by adding docs for BalancerMember directive
